China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ Reuters.com is your online source for the latest China news stories and current events, ensuring our readers up to date with any breaking news developments - Made with love by RSSHub(https://github.com/DIYgod/RSSHub) RS集线器i@diygod.me (DIYgod) zh-cn https://www.reuters.com/pf/resources/images/reuters/logo-vertical-default-512x512.png?d=116China News | Today's Breaking Stories | Reuters https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ 2024 年 2 月 23 日星期五下午 6:10:37 120
US, China officials discuss Russia-North Korea military cooperation, State Department saysA top U.S. official on North Korea held a video call this week with China's envoy on Korean Peninsula affairs in which they discussed the growing military cooperation between Moscow and Pyongyang, the State Department said on Friday. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 17:58:50 GMT VBSVNOTWPNLSDJFIEG3LLAECYI https://www.reuters.com/world/us-china-officials-discuss-Russia-north-korea-military-cooperation-state-2024-02-23/David Brunnstrom, Katharine Jackson世界
Key parts of sweeping US sanctions against RussiaThe U.S. on Friday issued sweeping sanctions against Russia over the death of opposition leader Alexei Navalny and to mark the second anniversary of the invasion of Ukraine, targeting more than 500 people and entities as Washington seeks to increase pressure on Moscow. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 14:27:07 GMT OJCXGXZNAVMXJLUDURSWU4谢谢https://www.reuters.com/world/key-parts-sweeping-us-sanctions-against-Russia-2024-02-23/Daphne Psaledakis, David Brunnstrom世界
US targets dozens of entities from China, UAE and Turkey for helping RussiaThe Biden administration said on Friday it has imposed new trade restrictions on 93 entities from Russia, China, Turkey, the United Arab Emirates, Kyrgyzstan, India and South Korea for supporting Russia's war effort in Ukraine. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 14:18:39 GMT QEYKI7ABTVICTGHM4AGNISHZNQ https://www.reuters.com/world/us-places-export-restrictions-93-entities- Russia-china-uae-turkey-others-2024-02-23/Karen Freifeld, Susan Heavey世界
Ex-head of Chinese university sanctioned by US becomes vice industry ministerA former head of a Chinese aeronautics university sanctioned by the Trump administration for links with the People's Liberation Army (PLA) has become a deputy of a ministry in charge of advancing Chinese technological innovation. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 13:35:12 GMT XEMEHKXH2RPPXCUK7WRAEZXKBY https://www.reuters.com/world/china/ex-head-of-chinese-university-sanctioned-by-us-becomes-vice-industry-minister-2024-02-23/Reuters世界中国
China, EU hold talks on cooperation in autos, raw materialsChina and the European Union held talks on progress and cooperation in a number of areas including automobiles and raw materials, China's Ministry of Industry and Information Technology said in a statement. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 12:16:28 GMT XMB4KPQPRFMYFGGOIVWIW5JJF4 https://www.reuters.com/world/china-eu-hold-talks-cooperation-autos-raw-materials-2024-02-23/Reuters世界
Two Chinese cities join Hong Kong travel scheme to boost tourismThe Chinese cities of Xian and Qingdao have been added to a travel scheme that allows residents to visit Hong Kong in a personal capacity, rather than in a tour group, as the financial hub struggles to revive its economy post-COVID. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 12:13:54 GMT DSQTMUOJDVKZFA5NB73544YRX4 https://www.reuters.com/world/china/two-chinese-cities-join-hong-kong-travel-scheme-boost-tourism-2024-02-23/Reuters世界中国
Investors still flock to cash as stocks hit record highsInvestors poured cash into money market funds at the fastest pace on record in the first weeks of the year, and funnelled another $15 billion into equities in the week to Wednesday, Bank of America Global Research said on Friday. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 12:13:44 GMT XURA3CD5AVLX3销售https://www.reuters.com/markets/investors-still-flock-cash-stocks-hit-record-highs-2024-02-23/Reuters市场
Tensions between China and NBA are 'water under the bridge' - Nets ownerJoe Tsai, owner of the Brooklyn Nets basketball team, said the NBA is “in a very good place” in its relationship with China, four years after Beijing took games off air following remarks about the 2019 Hong Kong protests by a team executive. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 11:22:15 GMT WCEWQ57GGJNZBNXNVYGHTQHKHQ https://www.reuters.com/sports/basketball/tensions- Between-china-nba-are-water-under-bridge-nets-owner-2024-02-23/Josh Ye运动的篮球
Morning Bid: Record world stocks leave bonds in gloomA look at the day ahead in U.S. and global markets from Mike Dolan Fri, 23 Feb 2024 11:03:54 GMT 4IC2MAUWMNJRTBMQ6RGWJLRQUA https://www.reuters.com/markets/us/global-markets-view-usa-2024-02-23/Reuters市场美国市场
BASF: Chinese imports into Europe are higher than everBASF said competition from Chinese rivals shipping their products into European chemical makers' home markets is at unprecedented levels and disruptions of the Red Sea transport route only have a temporarily dampening effect. China expected to take gradual approach to prop up economy further, say analystsChina is likely to persist with a gradual approach to stimulating its economy even as recent moves by its policymakers are unlikely to revive sentiment without further supply-side reforms and aggressive easing measures, market watchers said. Fri, 23 Feb 2024 10:02:16 GMT RJY2ARI3XRJ3LGHBY2Y2LOKJSI https://www.reuters.com/world/china/china-expected-to-take-gradual-approach-prop-up-economy-further-say-analysts-2024-02-23/Anisha Sircar市场宏观问题
